title: Hamich124D
author: Hamich124D
content: Hey guys I was thinking about starting to DCA (dollar cost averaging) on XRP every week/month.I don't want to go all in as of now because we're a bit too far form the previous bottom (somewhere around 0.28$) so i want to take advantage of some inevitable price corrections as much as i can.Do you think this is a good idea ? and for anyone holding XRP, what you're realistic target ?

comments.author: bitkanu
comments.body: Going all in is the worst choice that can be taken. Im using this coin as a bet for the future price. Im not going to call bottom again when we have reached it before. If the good news may come again soon and this can make the price of XRP to surge a lot like before. Im thinking about $1 as easy target for XRP as long as it can win the battle against SEC.

comments.author: chaser15
comments.body: Just do it without hesitation. XRP seems just playing on its establish price swing for months.Ask yourself, why XRP and not other coins? What you are thinking? What are your reasons?There will be more confusion if you will not execute your plan now. If you believed in XRP, just do the strategy you think is better.

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: I can't really say a lot about this. That's good to did DCA but the price movement actually depends on what news that will come soon. You have seen the price of XRP pumped a lot from the bottom due the news about optimism by some parties to see XRP foundation will win against SEC. The problem is when this is not predictable. That means when you are doing DCA and sometime you can get a surprise caused by the bad news was coming and then you are getting a trap. I will not put a high target for sure. Making doubled from the current price of XRP is more than enough during the bearish market like this. I will not expect a big increase to happen with XRP asap.

comments.author: cryptobadshah
comments.body: Yes, Ripple is in trouble with the SEC over XRP a cryptocurrency it owns In the midst of an SEC balttle Ripple will launch a cryptocurrency service for banks Ripple also sells ripplenet a network used by banks to move money across borders ripple's offering competes with SWIFT the global interbank payment network the corporation enters a new product category as interest in cryptocurrencies rises bitcoin and ether the leading and second biggest cryptocurrenices  both achieved record highs this week mainstream firms like Mastercard paypal and goldman sachs now endorse crypto Rippl's first customer is coinme a bitcoin exchange and ATM operator in the us. i think all things solve problems correctly you can see the price hype and up to 1 to 2$ easily.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: The past behavior can be taken as a good predictor of the future, so can Ripple’s price movement in recent years be considered an upward function, or is there enough development that can be relied upon to predict that the price will rise to above $1?Personally, I think that the answer to this question is no, and therefore XRP cannot be considered a good currency for DCA.You can wait when the price changes sharply and then buy as Ripple is making good corrections in the short term (I remember buying it when there was a legal issue[1] a few months ago and then selling it three months later.)[1] SEC Charges Ripple and Two Executives with Conducting
